content: the archer scrap yarn bag is a fun quick and beautiful messenger bag / fanny pack with i-cord sides and adjustable sizes for both bag and shoulder strap **this is the knitted version of this bag a crochet version is also available for free ** you can choose to knit it using scrap yarns and destashing your hoard * i see you yarn goblin * this pattern is perfect for first-time knitters as it s worked flat has easy construction is gender-neutral comes with written instructions as well as photos and can be adjusted to your needs worked in scrap yarns and preferrably using more strands held together this bag can also be a wonderfully quick project it comes with a captioned video tutorial on yt **overview ** language - english & italian level - beginner techniques used - k m1r m1l k2tog ssk there is **not** the need to **check gauge** or swatch for this pattern you ll measure it following the instructions **materials required ** yarn worsted or scrap yarns held together approximately 120-200gr of yarn depending on how big you want your bag and how long you want your shoulder straps more yarn might be needed **tools required ** 5mm / 6mm knitting needles stitch markers tapestry needle scissors this pattern is written and created by nene from @neneedle and liv from @pocket knits and has not be pattern tested please allow for human errors as they are inevitable please contact me if you have any questions or concerns i d be more than happy to answer your questions this pattern is available for free please share it with whoever you like + you are allowed to sell your creations made using this pattern please tag us in your photos we d love to see your creations happy knitting nene ^
